nft.title: Select an NFT
nft.noNFTs: No NFTs found for this address.

selected.title: Selected NFT
selected.subtitle: Are you sure you want to use this NFT?

upload.title: Upload Avatar
upload.subtitle: You need to sign a message to upload an avatar. This won't cost anything.

description.label: Short Bio
description.placeholder: I'm a yield farmer from rural Tennessee.

resumable.title: Resumable transaction
resumable.subtitle: You have previously started a transaction. Click resume to continue.

migrate.title: Migrate resolver
migrate.subtitle: You have migrated your profile but haven't updated your resolver. Click upgrade to update to the latest resolver.

noResolver.title: No resolver assigned
noResolver.subtitle: You need to set a resolver to edit your profile.

oldRegistry.title: Your registry is out of date
oldRegistry.subtitle: Migration to the new registry is not available, but you can still migrate this name in the old app.

default.title: Your resolver is out of date
default.subtitle: Profile editing is disabled until you update your resolver.

editResolver.title: Edit Resolver
editResolver.latestMessage: You are on the latest resolver

extendNames.bannerMsg: Extending for multiple years will save money on network costs by avoiding yearly transactions.

transferProfile.title: Transfer Profile
transferProfile.message1: Before upgrading, you can transfer your current profile if you'd like, otherwise it will be reset when you upgrade.
transferProfile.message2: Would you like to transfer your current profile?

revokeWarning.title: This will make permanent changes
revokeWarning.subtitle: Permissions are an advanced feature that make permanent changes to your name.  You will not be able to undo these changes, and they will only be reset if the name expires.
revokeWarning.subtitle2: Make sure you are confident using this feature before proceeding. <infoLink>Learn more about permissions</infoLink>

revokePCC.title: Give up ownership
revokePCC.subtitle: This will give ownership of this name to the manager ({{account}}). Unless you are also the manager, you will no longer be able to make changes to this name.

setExpiry.title: Set name expiry
setExpiry.subtitle: Set a date when permissions will expire. This date cannot be longer than the expiry of its parent ({{parent}}).
setExpiry.subtitleWithCEE: Set a date when this name will expire. This will replace it’s existing permission expiry ({{expiry}}), and cannot be later than the expiry of its parent ({{parent}}).

error.required: A date is required if a custom date is selected

revokeAdditional.title: Revoke permissions
revokeAdditional.subtitle: Would you like to revoke permissions on this name before giving up ownership? This can only be done now.

action.title: Revoke additional permissions
action.description: Unless you are also the manager, you will not be able to revoke additional permissions after this.

revokeUnwrap.title: Revoke permissions
revokeUnwrap.subtitle: You are required to revoke this permission before others can be revoked. This prevents permissions from being removed.

fuses.CANNOT_UNWRAP: Revoke permission to: Unwrap this name

revokePermissions.title: Revoke permissions
revokePermissions.unwrapSubtitle: Select this to enable the others

fuses.CANNOT_UNWRAP: Revoke permission to: Unwrap this name
fuses.CANNOT_TRANSFER: Revoke permission to: Send this name
fuses.CANNOT_APPROVE: Revoke permission to: Change renewal manager

revokeChangeFuses.title: Revoke permissions
revokeChangeFuses.subtitle: By revoking this permission you are permanently losing the ability to change any remaining fuses. This will only be reset if the name expires.

revokeChangeFusesWarning.title: Remaining permissions will be locked
revokeChangeFusesWarning.subtitle: Permissions and custom fuses will be permanently locked in their current state after ‘change permissions’ is revoked. This will only be reset if the name expires.

unknownLabels.title: Confirm your name
unknownLabels.subtitle: Some of the labels in your name aren't known. Please enter them to continue.

deleteEmancipatedSubnameWarning.title: This subname cannot be recreated
deleteEmancipatedSubnameWarning.message: Deleting this subname will prevent it from being used or recreated until it has expired{{date}}. This cannot be undone because the parent control permissions have been revoked.

resetPrimaryName.title: Remove Primary Name
resetPrimaryName.description: This name will no longer appear as the name for this address. However, transactions to this name will still resolve to this address unless you remove the ETH record.

extendNames.warning: Extending this name will not give you ownership of it

migrateAndUpdateResolver.title: Action Required
migrateAndUpdateResolver.heading: The edits you want to save to your profile require that you upgrade your resolver.
migrateAndUpdateResolver.warning: Note that if you cancel this at any point your changes will not be saved.

syncManager.description: Syncing the manager will make you the new manager of this name. The current manager ({{manager}}) will no longer be able to make changes.
syncManager.wrappedWarning: Syncing the manager will also unwrap this name. This will burn the NFT and reset any permissions.

updateEthAddress.title: Update ETH address
updateEthAddress.description: The ETH address for this name doesn't match this wallet. To use this as your primary name you will need to update the ETH address first.

noResolver.title: No resolver set
noResolver.description: To use this as your primary name you will need to set a resolver and update the ETH address first.
